runs.comm: starts off with a big outswinging wide well outside off, Finch also chases wildly. Nervous start
back of length well outside off and Finch stays back to jab it just past midwicket for three
down the leg side for Warner now, goes past his pads for another wide
full on the pads, worked away easily with the swing for one
down leg for Finch now, he just helps it along the way, it was swinging down as it is and goes fine for four
fullish outside off now, Finch swings his arms drives it to mid off
angled in towards the pads, tucked to midwicket for a single as the fielder gets a dive to get a hand
bouncer to end the over, that goes over Warner on the leg side and over Ronchi too. Four byes and 15 from the first over
starts off on the leg side, deflects off the pads on the leg side for one
thick edge for six! Shortish ball outside off, Warner threw his bat at it with a slog on the leg side and a very thick top edge went for six to the fine third man boundary
short and wide, Warner stays back and chips it over point for two
swing and a miss, there it is! Beautiful delivery shaping away from outside off, Warner pushed at it without moving much and missed
touch fuller and shaping away again, left alone this time
length delivery outside off, driven to short cover
second six in the first 13 balls! It was pitched up just outside off, Finch saw it early and lofted it straight down the ground to the long on boundary for a clean six

Southee draws first blood, the crowd erupts! He took the risk of pitching it up again just outside off, swung it in a bit and the ball went through the drive Finch unleashed. Off stump knocked over, Southee pumps his fists and is mobbed by his team-mates
easy first ball for Watson, get a full toss on the pads and he flicks it away just behind square on the leg side past the umpire for four
back to good-length delivery outside off, left alone this time
fullish on middle and leg, Watson puts his front foot forward and flicks it to the square leg region for two
much better and straighter from Southee on length, Watson defends on the leg side and sees there's no time for a run
swinging into the batsman, no room at all and Warner pushes it down to mid on
bit too full outside off, Warner drives to get it just past cover point and gets two
on the off stump now on length, pushed back to the bowler
angled into Warner again, worked with the swing to the leg side for one
angles it across with some outswing outside off and Watson lets it go
what a yorker! Right in the block hole on middle stump, Watson lost his balance but did well to get bat on it and dug it out to short midwicket
short ball just around leg stump line, goes over Warner as he ducks awkwardly
expects the short ball, gets it and pulls it to the fine leg boundary for a one-bounce four. There's no fielder there, was one deep backward square
another short ball and he slams it with a pull to the square leg boundary. Doesn't look like that bowling plan is working there, whatever it is
much better, on off stump and Warner blocks it back
length delivery outside off, pushed into the covers
slightly straighter on middle stump, turned to the leg side past midwicket for one
shortish just around off, jabbed off the back foot to leg for one
good, short ball angling across from just outside off, Watson drops his hands and lets it go
full on middle stump and it's flicked to leg for one
on length outside the off stump, turned softly to the leg side for one
full and wide, Warner chases and gets a thick edge in the air to third man. Southee runs in and does well to stop it after a bounce
angled across the batsman from outside off, a careful Watson lets it go
bit short outside off, Warner muscles it off the back foot to cover where there's a slight fumble
on length on middle now, Warner defends it on the off side
on length just outside off, pushed into the covers
pitched up on middle and leg, Warner slogs on leg and can't clear short midwicket
towards the leg side now, Warner wants to pull it fine but finds short fine leg
bit of room outside off and Warner punches it between point and cover point to avoid a maiden. Excellent over, nevertheless
short ball around off, Watson pulls and gets an inside edge onto his thigh pad
lovely inswinging delivery on length on off, inside edge onto the front pad
swings it again into Warner from middle stump, he works it to short midwicket this time
143mh, nice inswing again form off stump, Watson drives and gets another inside edge, this one down to fine leg
around length outside off, Warner drives it through the covers in the gap for two as Baz chases and cuts it back
errs down the leg side this time for a wide
edged to second slip after a bounce! Teasing line outside off, Warner was too late to leave and the ball took some bat to head towards second slip
length delivery towards off and middle, pushed back to the bowler towards the non-striker and a single is conceded as Warner comes in Vettori's way
towards middle and leg, worked to leg for an easy single
bit of room and turning away, Watson goes back and chops it just wide of short third man for one
short and flat towards leg, Warner goes down on a knee to pull but takes it on his body
nearly taken, very tough chance! Warner cut the ball outside off, got a thick edge and it went in the air to short third man where Boult dived to his right and maybe got a finger to it
length delivery around off, pushed down to mid off for one
length delivery outside off, defends it to cover off the back foot
short ball on the leg side and it's pulled to fine leg for one
beaten! Warner made a bit of room to push this one on off, but the ball shaped away just a bit from length outside off to evade him
pushes this one past short cover and cover point for one
length delivery from outside leg, taken on the pad as he tries to work it on leg
short ball angled in and he pulls it away flat and quick behind square on the leg side for a powerful four
comes down the track and pushes the ball to mid off
shuffles across and swats the ball to deep midwicket for one
sliding in towards middle and leg, defends on the leg side
coming in again towards the batsman, worked to deep backward
goes back and steers the ball from leg stump towards midwicket for one
pitched up outside off, driven into the covers straight to the fielder
another big wide to start the spell, swings it away from outside off for a wide
close to the wide line again but this one survives as Watson chases and misses
bit full outside off, Watson drives it nicely into the covers off the front foot. It's going for four but Baz chases again and saves two runs
angled in towards the batsman, worked off the pads past midwicket for two
length delivery outside off, solid defence from Watson
length delivery shaping away outside off, taps it late to third man for one
swinging in a bit towards the batsman, he defends it on leg with the lack of room
slightly full on middle, turned towards cow corner for one
well outside off, Warner gets room and pushes to deep point for one
outside the off stump, Watson slaps it down to long off for one
right on middle stump on length, pushed back to the bowler
flighted on middle stump, driven down the ground to long on for one

Watson has holed out! It was a innocuous short ball on the stumps, Watson went back in the crease and pulled it to the leg side where Southee went to his right to complete an easy catch at deep midwicket

two in two for NZ, Southee gets Warner lbw but he wants a review! This one swung into the batsman to cram him up as the ball probably headed towards middle leg, Warner went on is toes to defend as the ball hit just above the knee roll after pitching on leg. It's hitting the stumps, with umpire's call so Warner has to go!
shapes it away from the batsman well outside off, Smith lets it go
on length from wide of the crease outside off, pushed into the covers
outswing for the fullish delivery outside off, Smith drives it nicely into the covers. Who else but Baz chases it again to keep it to two
slightly full again outside off, Smith drives and Baz dives to his left to save a few runs
length delivery outside off with some room, steered towards deep point to get off the mark
comes down the track and pushes to long on for one
just short of slip! He drew Clarke forward towards off with a length delivery turning away, drew the edge too but it fell short of first slip
comes down the pitch and turns the ball to leg side for one
goes back dangerously and defends the ball from middle stump
flighted just outside off, Smith waits and defends it back
goes back and pushes the ball from outside off to point
bit too full outside off, driven handsomely through the covers in the gap for two
right on the off stump on length, Clarke defends solidly on the leg side
angled towards the pads from wide of the crease and Clarke flicks it away nicely off his legs to the square leg boundary for four
short ball angled in now, he hops back to help it to fine leg for one
nice outswinger outside the off stump, Smith lets it go
fullish outside off, driven straight to short cover and that's drinks
bit too short outside off, pulled straight to short midwicket
goes back this time to work the ball from middle to leg side for one
caught behind, one more for Vettori! It was a bit flatter outside off, Smith pushed at it towards the off side and the ball went straight into Ronchi's gloves after a thick outside edge
length delivery from middle and leg pushed down to long on
good length delivery just outside off, pushed to short midwicket
tight line on the off stump, Clarke defends it back carefully
yorker on the middle stump for Maxwell, it was swinging in as he dug it out on the off side

he's chopped it on, Australia crumbling here! The ball was angling away from Maxwell from outside the off stump, he looked to force it through the off side without any footwork and get an edge to disturb his stumps
full delivery around off, pushed on the leg side
goes down the leg side this time for a wide

one more, what's going on?! Marsh also drags it on and goes for a duck! This back of length delivery was seaming away from the batsman, he went to the back foot to defend on the off side but played the wrong line and got an edge onto his stumps. The crowd is roaring!
length delivery just outside off, he blocks it back
attempted yorker is blocked back to the bowler
outside off on length and he pushes it back to the bowler
goes back in the crease to turn the ball to leg from middle stumps
on the back foot and works it to midwicket from middle and leg
leans forward this time to push the ball down towards mid off
goes back again and runs this one with the angle fine down the leg side for four to bring up the 100
fullish outside off, driven down for one to long off
angled in from short of length, helped towards fine leg for one
just around the off stump, bit back of length and Clarke hops back to defend it back
wide outside the off stump and swings it away further, left alone
length delivery angling in little bit, left alone again
closer to the off stump, Clarke covers his stumps and defends it back
oh my, Clarke has given it away, Boult gets his third! He gave Clarke room on the off side, Clarke swung his arms uppishly and gave a straightforward catch to Williamson at short cover
goes on the back foot and defends with soft hands on the off side for one
slides it across on the off side, Mitch swings and misses
leans forward this time to defend the length delivery, that nearly got the outside edge
covers his stumps and defends dangerously on the off side off the back foot
on the pads now, worked away easily to square leg for one
flat towards off stump, Haddin goes back to defend it back
teasing line outside off, MJ stays back and lets it go
touch back of length outside off, MJ wants to smash it on the leg side with a heave but misses

that's a wonderful catch, one more falls! Johnson made room for the full delivery just outside off, drove it in the air and Williamson was there again, this time to dive to his right to grab it with both hands
errs a bit down the leg side, it deflects down to Ronchi who stops it with a dive
doesn't move his feet much and pushes the length delivery down to mid on

missing - the middle stump's gone missing! What a beaut there from Boult - it pitched right on middle stump on length, looked like it was angling in, which Starc played for, but it held its line after pitching and knocked over only the middle stump. The crowd is loving it
fullish on the pads, flicked off the legs behind square on leg for one
presses forward and blocks the ball on leg
leans forward again and blocks it back to the bowler
helps it off the pads to leg off the front foot
flighted on off, pushed down the ground to long off for a single
full delivery on off is driven down to long off for one
swinging in towards middle and leg, flicked in the air to deep square leg for one
angled across the off stump on length, he lets it go
length delivery right on the middle stump, Cummins defends it into the covers
angled in from slightly back of length, worked to the leg side for one
wide outside the off stump, he pushes it tentatively to backward point
appeal for lbw as he's hit on the front pad bit it pitched around leg and was going down with the swing
sliding towards middle and leg, worked to midwicket for a single
just over mid on! It was pitched up outside off, Haddin saw the length and smashed it down the ground to clear mid off for four
widish outside off, pushed into the covers in the gap for two more
pitched up again and Haddin lofts it straight down the ground again, clears long off by hitting it pretty straight for six
doesn't move much and pushes the length delivery back to the bowler
short and flat towards middle stump, goes back and punches to cover
swinging into the pads, flicked straight to midwicket
nasty bouncer that was, heading towards Cummins' head as he swayed out of the line
full delivery now and it's driven firmly down to mid off
right in the block hole on middle stump, Cummins does well to block it on off
back of length and angling in from outside off, defended off the back foot
misses everything, that went through the batsman! Short of length and this one swung in even more as Cummins defended on the wrong line, went just over the stumps
makes room to clear the off side but gets an edge back to the bowler
back of length delivery towards the off stump, Haddin makes some room and defends on the off side
bouncer towards the bats batsman now, this one goes over his bat and head as he tries to pull and it's called a wide
falls short of mid off! Haddin wants to make use of the Powerplay, he makes room, connects, but chips it towards mid off
short offcutter towards middle and leg is pulled to the leg side for two
exposes his stumps and drives the attempted yorker down to long on for one
leans forward a bit and defends the ball solidly on the off side
143kmh, makes room to drive on the off side, misses the half-volley just outside off
pretty full on the off stump, Haddin defends it back to the bowler
150kmh, attempted yorker is a full toss on off, Haddin steers it to point

low full toss on middle stump now, Haddin makes room to push it to mid off. The fielder throws it to the keeper but the ball lands on the edge of the pitch and deflects away towards fine leg for an overthrow
149kmh, length delivery outside off, swing and a miss from Cummins
150kmh, really low full toss on off, blocked into the covers by Cummins
makes room for the short of length delivery and cuts it over short third man for four. Clever batting from Haddin
exposes his stumps again and guides the length delivery to short third man along the ground
swats the short ball on the off side and just manages to clear backward point for two more runs
slogs the full delivery on the leg side by making some room but mistimes it down to long on
back of length on the off stump, defends it back to the bowler
full on the pads, runs it down to fine leg with the angle for one
backs away and steers the low full toss to point
full on the pads, Haddin flicks it away to the leg side in the deep but says no for the single
147kmh, short ball angled in, Haddin makes room to scoop it over third man but misses
makes a bit of room again and drives the full ball into the covers
146kmh, full toss on leg stump, pushed to midwicket for a single but there isn't time for one

another full toss, this time Haddin finds the gap and gets four! Made room yet again and steered this one past point towards the boundary. Guptill ran from third man and put in a dive but touched the boundary when he stopped the ball
leaves the length delivery alone outside the off stump
another one well outside off, another one left alone
sends in a bouncer this time by angling it in, Cummins drops his hands and sways his head out of the line
low full toss on off and it's driven down straight to mid off
bouncer to end the over too, Cummins leaves it again and that's drinks
fullish on middle and leg, flicked to deep midwicket for one
149.6kph, bit of outswing for the length delivery outside off, left alone
147kmh, short ball outside off, wide enough to be left alone
full toss on off, Cummins steered it to backward point where Guptill threw himself and stopped it with one hand. Laud applause from the crowd
fullish on the stumps now, pushed back to the bowler
full delivery swinging away from well outside off, easy leave again
and he's welcomed with a six first ball! Anderson pitched it up, Haddin stood straight and tall and lofted it straight down the ground to hit the sight screen

goes this time, gives a catch to short third man! Anderson pitched it shorter this time, Haddin went through the shot little early with a drive and got a thick edge for short third man. The last man falls
